Es war mal ein sehr schönes Spiel als ich 2020 damit angefangen habe. Man hatte mal schwere und mal weniger schwere Matches, insgesamt war es aber recht ausgeglichen. Balancing war schon damals leider eher schwach und dadurch dass man meint alle 1-2 Monate neue Killer und Survivor herausbringen zu müssen, um mehr Profit zu schlagen, verstärkt sich die Unbalance nur weiter.
Das schlimmste ist, dass das Matchmaking von den Devs total kaputt gemacht wurde und man in 9 von 10 Fällen nur noch stressige Matches hat, selbst nach einem Jahr Pause, welches offensichtlich nicht im MMR berücksichtigt wird.

Daher deinstalliere ich dieses Spiel nun vermutlich zum letzten Mal und sage danke an die Devs, dass Ihr ein schönes Spiel wirklich kaputt gemacht habt. Es ist wirklich eine Schande!

O jogo atualmente possui vários problemas. Recomendo o jogo para quem tem paciência e amigos. Para jogar de surv sem chorar nos comentários, reclamando de coisa extremamente sem contexto e utilidade. Como por exemplo: Hit box. Se pretende jogar de killer, você não terá tantos problemas, porque atualmente está mais fácil devido ao meta de survivor que foi dilacerado. Conclusão: COMPRE EVIL DEAD: THE GAME

After 5 years of DBD i quit the game. It was a fun game and i had strange, funny and exciting games. I was never a really high skilled player and Dead Hard or Iron Will were necessary perks for me as survivor. 

Almost every necessary perk is now nerfed to a level, where it is unplayable. I wanna thank the Devs to help high ranked Killer mains. But for me ... it's over.
Fun game, time filler, meet lots of new people, fun communities! Overall 9.9/10 game, other .1 is because of toxic players, but the toxicity makes the game funny.

Legit started the game the day I'm writing this review and let's say, it feels like an absolute rip off.
I should be paid to play this absolute abomination of a game yo and I spent money on this. 

The killers are way to busted, the map is absolutely covered with hooks so you have no chance to actually struggle free, killers get no repercussions for camping and tunneling which makes the solo queue survivor experience absolutely horrible, not fun and unplayable. The perks are little to no help, the chances of the survivors winning is as slim as it gets and you might win 1 out of 100 games. 

Instead of being a fun, horror, multiplayer game this is more like a rage game if anything. If you don't wanna main killer, you might as well either skip, get a refund or just stay away from this game altogether. Honestly, not worth the frustration, annoyance, and very unfun stress.

Devs should either balance their game or honestly just make the game free, cause it's simply not worth a single cent the way it is now (pretty unplayable as a surv main)

The game has potential, but the developers are totally incompetent. Bugs are everywhere, updates get worse everytime; patch 6.1.0 literally compromised the survivor side game. Playing has become stressful; players are insane who don't mind having fun but winning, whatever it takes. I don't recommend starting playing Dead by Daylight, just wasted time.

少ないキラーを守るか、新規ユーザーが始めるサバを優遇するのかこれからの課題である。
自分は、PT以外なら別ゲーやるかも。

Eu simplesmente amo o DBD. Porém, muitos bugs existiam até a recente atualização em 19/07/22. Os bugs que eu percebia, como por exemplo, survs sumindo quando íamos dar um hit (eu sou main killer), ou a lanterna que cega mesmo de lado e piscando, até que enfim resolveram! Parabéns à equipe que está demonstrando o seu trabalho para melhorias contínuas.

The purpose of the new update is to make you spend money. You have no blood points ever (devs even said they were tired of people having so many) and no iridescent shards. The kicker is they give you challenges that can only be done by one survivor and they put that survivor on sale. IT IS JUST A SCAM TO MAKE YOU PAY FOR CHARACTERS!

158시간 느낀 점 : 
1순위 / 극악의 매칭 시스템 (살인마 초보 or 살인마 고수 , 생존자 초보 or 생존자 고수 / 적응 할려면 어쩔 순 없지만 이건 개 쳐맞아야함 생존자 익숙해지면 살인마 약올림 )
2순위 /  다인랭 ( 서로 소통하기 때문에 갈고리 걸렸을때 위치 다 알려주고 발전기 빡세게 돌림 살인마 위치 사라지면 칼같이 살림 사실상 올킬은 커녕 1킬도 하기 힘듬 ) 
3순위 버그가 많음 ( 판자,넘기,걸림, 겜 자체 튕김 ) 
4순위 / 핵 ( 사실상 중국인이 압도적 스핵, 위치핵,생존자 갈고리 상태로 무적 상태  ) 등등 
5순위 / 점수작하는 살인마  ( 10~15분 넘게 매칭 기다렸는데 만나면 걍 랜뽑 마려움  ) 
사실상 접어야했는데 돌이킬수가 없어서 그냥 하는중 친구가 한번 해보고 싶다는데 앵간하면 하지말라고 추천함
